name: Mimpi Signal
description:
Help Mimpi escape a mad scientist’s lab by finding the right wave!

Your objective is to use three different controls to manipulate wavelegth, speed or amplitude of the wave - don’t worry if this sounds too scientific, you’ll get it, it’s easy! Just try it and see!
Enjoy the distinctive, fantastic graphic of this minigame that is based on award winning Mimpi the game.

Game Features:
Mimpi, the cutest puppy ever. No kidding - check the screenshots!
10 unbelievable contraptions to hunt the waves in.
Distinctive visual style, as seen in Mimpi the Game.

Important:
This game is not Mimpi the Game!
No further in app purchases required.
Compatible with iPad, iPod touch 4G, iPhone 4 and newer.

More levels coming soon!

Follow us for the latest info and game news!
